original_title: 「人生ずっと真面目に生きてきました。でも今日だけは悪い子になります...。」本物女教師人生で一度きりのAVデビュー
overview: Oura Manami, 23 years old. A new female teacher who will start as an elementary school teacher this spring. Before she went to the podium, she wanted to have sex as much as she wanted to forget her past experiences. At first, there were conflicts such as tension and guilt, but as the shooting progressed, he showed a bold appearance. Finally, he said to us, "I will do my best as a teacher by cutting my hair and changing my makeup. Thank you."
title: “I’ve Always Lived My Life Like A Proper Girl. But Today, I’m Going To Be A Bad Girl…” A Real-Life Female Teacher Makes Her Once And Only AV Debut Manami Oura
